;Track current book style: if (MS03.standard > MS03.smart && MS03.standard > MS03.tough && MS03.standard > MS03.sly && MS03.standard > MS03.snide) Set MS03.currentStyle to 0 elseif (MS03.smart > MS03.standard && MS03.smart > MS03.tough && MS03.smart > MS03.sly && MS03.smart > MS03.snide) Set MS03.currentStyle to 1 elseif (MS03.tough > MS03.smart && MS03.tough > MS03.standard && MS03.tough > MS03.sly && MS03.tough > MS03.snide) Set MS03.currentStyle to 2 elseif (MS03.sly > MS03.smart && MS03.sly > MS03.tough && MS03.sly > MS03.standard && MS03.sly > MS03.snide) Set MS03.currentStyle to 3 elseif (MS03.snide > MS03.smart && MS03.snide > MS03.tough && MS03.snide > MS03.sly && MS03.snide > MS03.standard) Set MS03.currentStyle to 4 else Set MS03.currentStyle to 0 endif

Objective.Description: Ask Moira Brown about her book.
Help Moira with Chapter 1.
Find food in the Super-Duper Mart.
(Optional) Find medicine in the Super-Duper Mart.
Return to Moira.
Contract radiation sickness (200 rads).
(Optional) Contract more severe radiation sickness (600 rads).
Return to Moira.
Travel to the playground in Minefield.
(Optional) Bring a landmine to Moira.
Return to Moira.
Help Moira with Chapter 2.
Test the repellent on three Mole Rats.
(Optional) Test the repellent on seven more Mole Rats.
Return to Moira.
Place the observer in a spawning pod in the Anchorage War Memorial.
(Optional) Do not kill any Mirelurks in the Anchorage War Memorial.
Return to Moira.
Become seriously injured (50% health or less).
(Optional) Receive a crippling injury.
Return to Moira with your injuries.
Help Moira with the last chapter.
Learn the history of Rivet City.
(Optional) Check other sources to confirm Rivet City's history.
(Optional) Uncover Rivet City's true history.
Return to Moira.
Install the processor widget in the RobCo production facility mainframe.
(Optional) Reprogram the RobCo facility mainframe.
Return to Moira.
Access the card catalogue in Arlington Public Library.
(Optional) Retrieve complete library archives.
Return to Moira.
